synsets.definition: Deep-seated desire for achievement and advancement; the inner drive to reach higher social or professional positions across cultures
Active pursuit of opportunities and relentless effort toward upward mobility; the grinding work ethic behind social advancement
Culturally-rooted sense of purpose that drives individual advancement while serving collective good; ambition aligned with cultural values
Strategic development of social connections and cultural capital to facilitate upward mobility within established power structures
Intense passionate drive and warrior spirit channeled toward personal advancement; fierce determination to overcome obstacles
Self-reliant pursuit of advancement through individual initiative and resourcefulness; building success from humble beginnings
